scripts.dev: (pnpm run docker:up > /dev/null &) && sleep 5 && trap 'pnpm run docker:stop' EXIT && dotenv -e .env -- turbo run dev --env-mode=loose --ui tui
scripts.dev:manual: pnpm run docker:up && trap 'pnpm run docker:stop' EXIT && dotenv -e .env -- turbo run dev --filter=!@cap/storybook --no-cache --concurrency 1
scripts.dev:windows: start /b cmd /c "pnpm run docker:up > nul" && timeout /t 5 /nobreak > nul && dotenv -e .env -- turbo run dev --env-mode=loose --ui tui
scripts.clean: find . -name node_modules -o -name .next -o -name .output -o -name .turbo -o -name dist -type d -prune | xargs rm -rf
